column4: i know oyu double click on the properties and you can change the values
can someone help me with my web proxy issue please? i can't install anything it seems
you find a solution for one thing, only to find it busts another 27
i can't update/upgrade/install anything. it just gives me one of a load of excuses
Eh?  Name one such excuse.
Is the Ubuntu machine connected to the Internet?
it is, yes
i believe it's a web proxy issue... i need to find a way to explicitly set http proxies
Oh, okay!  We can handle that.
i'm going to give my isp some grief over it though. i told them about the broken cache ages ago and they told me to explicitly set a working one... but they haven't fixed the broken one
Well, good, ISPs should be given grief if they don't provide good internet service. (-:

their telephone support is a joke... it sends you round and round a menu system before it finally tells you "this number is unavailable" and then cuts you off... honestly, it's like something out of the twilight zone
That's pretty weird.
that seems right.
Can you pastebin your /etc/apt/sources.list and ALL files in /etc/apt ?
Right, or you could just let me log in and try. (-;
i've uploaded the info you asked for to some webspace
Well, fine, URL?
did you get a chance to see the info yet?
No, did you give me a URI to it?
I don't think you did.
You have to be registered with NickServ for private messages to work.
Hah, okay.
did you get the link ok?
